Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.thumbs

Thumbnail "Visualizers" (that take care of refreshing thumbnails)

See:
          Description


Interface Summary
ThumbnailThread.Listener Listener interface for completed thumbnails.
 

Class Summary
Thumbnailer Class that will render a SVGPlot into a File as thumbnail.
ThumbnailThread Thread to render thumbnails in the background.
ThumbnailThread.Task A single thumbnailer task.
ThumbnailVisualization Thumbnail visualization.
